item.title: Statistical Gravity through Affine Quantization
item.description: arXiv:2411.17131v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: I propose a possible way to introduce the effect of temperature (defined through the virial theorem) into Einstein's theory of general relativity. This requires the computation of a path integral on a 10-dimensional flat space in a four dimensional spacetime lattice. Standard path integral Monte Carlo methods can be used to compute it.
item.dc:creator: Riccardo Fantoni
